sentences.cn: “这是不是太不可思议了？”她低声说。

sentences.en: "What a marvelous carving!" the starving harvester in vest said.
sentences.cn: “好一件神奇的雕刻！”挨饿的穿着背心的收割者说。

sentences.en: All the initial parameters of the system quickly converge upon termination, when history tells us human society is a system that displays marvelous continuing expansion.
sentences.cn: 系统的所有初始参数迅速向着终点汇聚，可历史却告诉我们，人类社会是一种显示非凡的不断膨胀的系统。

sentences.en: Despite its marvelous achivements, Greek mathematics was flawed.
sentences.cn: 尽管有了不起的成就, 希腊数学是有缺陷的.

sentences.en: Even though they weren't expecting me, they managed to knock up a marvelous meal.
sentences.cn: 他们虽然没想到我要来, 但还是设法匆匆做了一顿丰盛的饭.

sentences.en: He had had the most marvelous experience.
He had marvelous antenna, he was nervous.
sentences.cn: 他的触觉实在灵敏得惊人.

sentences.en: He was on fire with this marvelous sight.
sentences.cn: 看到这一令人叹为观止的景象，他激动万分。

sentences.en: It is all the same God, and that God showed me that the universe in which we live is a beautiful and marvelous mystery that is connected together forever and for always.
sentences.cn: 他们所谈的是同一个上帝，这位上帝向我展示了我们生活在其中的这个宇宙的美丽和奇妙的神秘，它们关联在一起，永永远远。

sentences.en: It was the most marvelous release I have ever had when the news came in.
sentences.cn: 我一生从未象听到那个好消息时那样轻松.

sentences.en: It'seems to me a most marvelous book.
sentences.cn: 这本书我觉得奥妙之至.

sentences.en: Its color and design are marvelous; its drawing contemptible.
sentences.cn: 它的颜色和图案是惊人的, 它的图画却很无聊.

sentences.en: That dress looks marvelous on you.
The marvelous acting compensated for the play's weak script.
sentences.cn: 本剧的精彩表演弥补了剧本的不足.

sentences.en: The weather in Budapest is among the best in Europe, with marvelous spring and fall seasons.
sentences.cn: 布达佩斯拥有全欧洲最棒的气候, 春天和秋天尤佳.

sentences.en: Then he enjoyed the marvelous performance.
sentences.cn: 然后他欣赏起这妙极的演出来。

sentences.en: What makes the whole thing so marvelous is the exuberance of the participants.
sentences.cn: 使这一切如此奇妙的是参加者充沛的精力.

sentences.en: Wonderful, marvelous. Police always are servants of upper caste, money, politicians. You cant expect justice for dalits in this country.
sentences.cn: 好极了，了不起。警察一直是高种姓、金钱、政客的仆人。达利特在这个国家无法期望得到公正。

words.tran_cn: 奇迹般地；不可思议地；令人惊讶地
不大可能的,难以置信的

trans.tran_cn: 引起惊异的，不可思议的，非凡的，神乎其神
